JobFullDesc: At Raytheon Missiles & Defense, fresh thinking and possibilities are forged in times of change and you will be on the front lines as we trailblaze new approaches, push the boundaries of innovation and chart a course to a tomorrow you can be proud to have a hand in creating.Job Summary:The Candidate Engagement team is a collaborative, dynamic and innovative group that focuses on key areas within Talent Acquisition: Diversity, Events, Military Outreach and Strategic Sourcing.  This team prides itself on executing creative talent attraction strategies, producing a world-class candidate experience and hiring the most talented minds in the defense industry.  The Talent Acquisition Strategic Technical Sourcer is responsible for driving diverse talent to Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD). The ideal candidate for this role has a strong foundation in research, niche recruiting and sourcing capabilities, and has the capability to create and implement strategies to find and attract a diverse pool of technical and engineering talent.  This role will demonstrate collaboration skills to identify and produce the right outcomes, effectively manage priority changes and offer creative solutions to various business challenges.This position will offer a flexible work arrangement, but will require the ability to go into the Tewksbury, MA office as needed.
